title: Cafe Greg - Weizmann
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Middle Eastern, Kosher, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Chain cafe near the Tel Aviv Museum of Art. Offers a separate vegan menu that includes a full vegan breakfast, frittata made with chickpea flour, salads, sandwiches, Asian style stir fries, and curry. Kosher (Mehadrin).
